Class Admin

java.lang.Object
domain.Person
domain.Admin
public class Admin extends Person
Represents an administrator user in the library system.

The Admin class extends Person and adds functionality specific to administrators, such as tracking their operational status using UserStatus.

  • Constructor Summary

    • Admin

      public Admin()
      Default constructor that creates an empty Admin object.

    • Admin

      public Admin(String userName, String password)
      Constructs a new Admin with the specified credentials.
      Parameters:
      userName - the administrator's username/email
      password - the administrator's login password

    • Admin

      public Admin(String userName, String password, String name, String id, String phone)
      Constructs a new Admin with full profile information.
      Parameters:
      userName - the administrator's username/email
      password - the administrator's password
      name - the administrator's full name
      id - the unique administrator identifier
      phone - the administrator's phone number
